sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Wyl is a young guardsman sworn to House Stark. He is killed differently than in the show: the Lannister guardmen pull him off his horse and use their swords to kill him.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Wyl travels south with Lord [[Eddard Stark]] when the latter is appointed [[Hand of the King]]. He accompanies Lord Stark to one of [[Petyr Baelish]]'s brothels, and is speared by Lannister guardsmen on the orders of Ser Jaime.<ref>"[[The Wolf and the Lion]]"</ref>
